affx::TsvFile Class Reference

A class for reading and writing Tab Seperated Value (TSV) files. /// See the TsvFile format document /// and the example program tsv-example.cpp . More...

#include <TsvFile.h>

Detailed Description

A class for reading and writing Tab Seperated Value (TSV) files. /// See the TsvFile format document /// and the example program tsv-example.cpp .

Definition at line 418 of file TsvFile.h.
